column2: English
Training
Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Tubbergen captured. Over.
Alpha Black calling Papa Bear. Papa Bear, we have just cleared the fuel depot. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. Galder is now under NATO control. Over.
Papa Bear, Alpha One here. The bridge road block has been opened. The bad guys are dead. Over.
Alpha to Papa Bear. We see ripe targets near our coordinates. Requesting CAS southeast of Galder. Over.
You ground-pounders, this is Wonder Warthog One overhead. Ready for attack run. Keep your heads down. Warthog One, out.
Roger that, Alpha. Affirmative, Tubbergen is ours. Papa Bear out.
Alpha, we hear you and understand. Good work. Papa Bear out
Papa Bear to Alpha One. We copy you, Alpha. HQ out.
Papa Bear to Alpha. Acknowledged. Fine work. HQ out.
Alpha Black, this is your Papa talking. Your mission is accomplished. Out.
HQ to to Alpha. Roger that, we're dispatching an A-10 Thunderbolt to your area. Out.
War Plan Orange
McKenzie, Regular, at Ummanz Airbase.
Start
Capture Tubbergen
Clear Fuel Depot
Capture Galder
Neutralize Road Block
